titleStmt.title: By the Councell Board at White-Hall, the 24. of May. 1625 this to bee proclaimed by sound of drumme aboard the kings ships, and the rest of the nauie, as likewise, in all such other places, as the commissioners for the nauy shall think fit.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Signed at bottom of sheet: G. Cant, Io. Lincolne, C.S., Iames Ley. H. Mandeville, Ol. Grandisone, E. Conwey.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
